name: LARGE U-TURN TOTE - YELLOW DOT
description:
LESS THAN HALF PRICE!
A snappy tote in a modern design that will hold all of your essentials and anything else you might grab along the way.

Cotton outer and cotton lining with nylon straps and magnetic closure. 

Bag length: 41cm/16 inches
Bag width: 30cm/11.75 inches
Strap length: 79cm/31 inches

Spot clean with cold water, can be ironed to keep it looking crisp (do not iron the straps).

If you have any questions, please check out my FAQ page or just email me, I’ll be happy to put down my martini and do my best to help.

name: CRUMPLE WRISTLET - YELLOW DOTS **LAST ONE**
description:
LESS THAN HALF PRICE!
Wristlets are the perfect size to hold all the important stuff like your wallet, keys, lipstick and other girly essentials. The Crumple wristlet unfolds to a rectangle clutch which makes it perfect for travel.

Perfect for: 
-	Shopping, as you have both hands free 
-	Walking the dog. Great place to keep empty plastic bags. 
-	Bridesmaids or wedding guests. 
-	Parties. Makes it easier to throw your hands up in the air and wave them like you just don’t care. 
-	Traveling. It’s impossible for someone to just reach inside and grab your wallet. The wristlet ‘locks’ itself when you’re wearing it.

Made from interfaced interfaced cotton with cotton lining and nylon zip closure. Can be hand washed gently and pressed with a warm iron.

Wristlet (folded) measurements:
24cm/9.5 inches wide (at widest part)
20cm/8 inches tall (not including strap)
Strap is 42cm/16.5 inches long

Clutch (unfolded) measurements:
29cm/11.5 inches wide (not including straps)
18cm/7.25 inches tall

If you have any questions, please check out my FAQ page or just email me, I’ll be happy to put down my martini and do my best to help.

name: SMALL SEMI CIRCLE ZIP TOTE - GREY DOTS
description:
LESS THAN HALF PRICE!
Perfect size for wallet, phone, iPad, book, keys and a makeup bag. Great as an everyday bag for holding your essentials or take it shopping so you don't have to fish through a huge bag for your wallet, phone or keys.  

Made from polycotton and lined with cotton, you can easily spot clean it.

Measurements:
33cm/13 inches at widest point
23cm/9 inches long
Straps: 66cm/26 inches long

name: LONG ZIP POUCH - GREEN DOT **LAST ONE**
description:
LESS THAN HALF PRICE!
An extra long zip pouch perfect for brushes (makeup or hair), curling iron, flat iron or charger leads. Excellent for travelling or for popping in your oversized handbag.

Made from polycotton outer and cotton lining, it is important that you only store your curling iron or flat iron once they are completely cooled.

Measurements: 
37.5cm/14.75 inches wide
12cm/4.75 inches long

Spot clean with cold water, can be ironed to keep it looking crisp.

name: large semi circle zip tote - cobalt
description:
LESS THAN HALF PRICE!
I like big bags and I cannot lie. They hold all my stuff and I have got lots of stuff that I like to carry around with me.  This big tote has the looks and the space, it's sturdy and interfaced with a fusible wadding that helps prevent wrinkles. Oh if only skincare was that easy!  Should it get a little crumpled, just run a warm iron over it but just be sure not to iron the straps. 

Made from medium-heavy weight cotton and lined with cotton, you can easily spot clean it.

Measurements:
52cm/20.5 inches at widest point
35cm/ 13.75 inches long
Straps: 70cm/27.5 inches long

If you have any questions, please check out my FAQ page or just email me, I’ll be happy to put down my martini and do my best to help.

name: LEATHER PINCH POUCH - BLACK WITH SILVER STRAP
description:
LESS THAN HALF PRICE!
You're walking the dog, walking yourself, out at a pub, a picnic, you're forever losing your travel card in your big bag, you're at a market buying fruit & veg...I don't know about you but there are times when I want my money/keys/travel card within easy reach and I either don't want to take a bag with me or my bag is so full of stuff that searching through it is a pain in the bum.  That's exactly why I made these Pinch Pouches!
Made from leather, with a metal flex frame and with a leather strap, they are tough, look great and it's easy for you to access your valuables (or dog poop bags!) but not for others to.

The opening is 11cm wide and the pouch is 14cm long (including closure), 12cm deep excluding closure. Strap is approx 115cm long. Can easily be made shorter. 

If you have any questions, please check out my FAQ page or just email me, I’ll be happy to put down my martini and do my best to help.

name: PATTY THE PUNK
description:
SUPER BARGAIN! Was $65!
Patty isn't a hardcore punk, she just loves bright mohawks and ear bling.

The base fabric is a cotton/linen blend and Patty is a mix of cotton and acrylic. I promise there's no blood, sweat or tears in it, although it would be far more impressive if there was. Gross but impressive.
There's are hundreds of tiny stitches that make up the mohawk, the whole thing took around 4.5 hours.

Hoop is 21cm/8.27inches in diameter. The embroidery is 15cm high and 7cm wide.

I have added neon pink and lime tassels but if they are not your think, just message me and let me know what colour/s you would like. I'm happy to change them at no extra charge.

No charge for delivery within Australia
